list.description:
#sight #anime #animegirls #burnice #zzz #zenlesszonezero #zenless_zone_zero
A gun sight with Burnice from zzz.
*Note: there are a few lines that won't show in game(I've made too many), but they won't affect at all the drawing, it will look like in the 3rd photo

...And Justice for All.

No. 20
Description: The reticle of the PK-A Scope found on Battlefield 4, made for suitable use as a tank gunsight.

Bonus drawing: Album cover of Metallica's "...And Justice For All" (DARKNESS, IMPRISONING ME)

Best used: Universally. Sight choices have one with ballistics and without ballistics to accommodate low tier and top tier combat.

WTDraw files present inside for the album cover. More instructions available on the README folder.

#wtdraw #universal #sight #sights #a...

Trust me, It's milk.
Leave me a like

#anime #wtdraw

Hi! My name is!

No. 19
Description: A Usersight based on the Trijicon VCOG 6x reticle. Looks and feels familiar to my earlier ACOG sights because they're made by the same company!

Bonus drawing: Album cover of the single; "My Name Is" - Eminem (CHKA-CHKA!)

Best used: for tanks with moderate-high velocity rounds like mid tier APHE and top tier APFSDS, not recommended for very low velocity tank guns.

WTDraw files present inside for the album cover. More instructions available on the README folder.
</b...

Guess Who's Back.

No. 18
Description: A rudimentary sight based on the 1.6x scope of the FN F2000 includes both a clean and a ballistic version.

Bonus drawing: Eminem - Without Me (BACK AGAIN 😎😎😎)

Best used: Universally; options for low tier and top tier tanks are present.

WTDraw files present inside for the album cover. More instructions available on the README folder.

#wtdraw #universal #sight #sights #alltanks #all_tanks #mbt #lowtier #toptier #eminem #guesswhosback

#wtdraw #ultrakill #lowtier
My first sight and I chose to do the new Province enemy coming in Ultrakills next major update, It is designed for early tiers because of the size but if anyone rally wants I can make one for higher tiers.(no colours attached to the file so you don't have to copy the file to sight presets), this is based on Hakita's released concept art

Install guide : unzip in War Thunder\UserSights ( if the folder does not exist - create it ) then head to Options - Ground vehicle Battle settings - Sight settings and then chose sight in "Reticle" tab

This is my first sight, I will be glad if you download!

#Earth_chan #Earth #anime

#universal #all_tanks #mbt

MBT Universal sights
Has visual for barrel position and distance visual under reticle.

If you find them small you can increase font size multiplier. It makes the sights bigger or smaller. ->
fontSizeMult:r = 0.6

Custom Sight — Curious Officer Girl

This custom reticle features a calm, curious anime-style girl in an officer-style cap, lying down and looking directly into your sight.

Note: The eagle emblem on her cap is purely decorative and not linked to any ideology. I simply enjoy military fashion and aesthetics. This is not intended as a political reference.

Made for fun and style. If you like unique sights with character, give this one a try.

#anime #officer #waifu #girl #animegirls #art
